import DollarIcon from './images/icon-dollar.svg' import PersonIcon from './images/icon-person.svg' import TipButtons from './TipButtons' const Form = ({bill, setBill, people, setPeople, tip, addTip, setReset}) => { return(

setBill(e.target.value)}/>


setPeople(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Form
